channel.title: Runeleak | OldSchool | 24 / 7 | Perfect Switches | Old Graphics | New items |
channel.description:
[hr] [center][img]http://puu.sh/2gRv6[/img] [hr][hr] Hi and welcome to Runeleak. Runeleak is a runescape private server, with old graphics & combat system. Old wilderness, but has new items. [hr] New items won't be released yet, and i'm still looking for staff. [hr] This is a Skilling/Player killing server. All skills work, Switching is perfect! So is player killing! [hr] What are you waiting for? [hr] Webclient: [url=http://www.runeleak.biz/webclient/webclient.html]http://www.runeleak.biz/webclient/webclient.html[/url]
[hr]
Forums: [url=http://www.runeleak.biz]www.runeleak.biz[/url] [hr] [size=24pt][u]NOTE: COMBAT EXP = [b]HIGH[/b] | SKILLS EXP = [b]LOW[/b][/u][/size] [hr] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/3h3g5wL.png[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/2rBxa[/img] [img]http://i.snag.gy/Sc2VQ.jpg[/img] [img]http://i.snag.gy/gopri.jpg[/img] [img]http://i.snag.gy/Koe8G.jpg[/img] [hr] Information about the server: [hr] Some more Stability work, didn't start lagging until 650+ were logged in Added the Cheat client dupe fix that was released (credits to the person that released) Clickable buttons in the Quest Tab interface Implemented Cycle Events (i know its not hard) Magic works (Ice barrage, Blood barrage, Ect) Weapon Specs work (Darkbow, Dragon dagger, Godswords and others) Friendly Staff and members, all training to become better. Working godwars, 20 kills before entering Skills like; Farming, Thieving and Agility all work. Every skill able to be trained to 200m exp. [hr] What are you waiting for? Come and play today, if you join now in the future you'll be classed as a Veteran member of the community, this will give you cool awards on the forums, so sign up and start making bank today. [hr] *
Thanks, hope to see you around in-game. [/center]

Thanks man, feel free to join anytime

kidgoku4522:

seems like a rsvirtue Leech to me only the home is moved

Me and Nick started Rs-virtue a few years ago, now i run this with Nick, this is based of Rsvirtue yes.

item.title: Runeleak | OldSchool | 24 / 7 | Perfect Switches | Old Graphics | New items |
item.dc:creator: @StonedC0D3r StonedC0D3r
item.description:
@StonedC0D3r wrote:

[hr]
[center]
[hr][hr]
Hi and welcome to Runeleak.
Runeleak is a runescape private server, with old graphics & combat system.
Old wilderness, but has new items.
[hr]
New items won’t be released yet, and i’m still looking for staff.
[hr]
This is a Skilling/Player killing server. All skills work, Switching is perfect! So is player killing!
[hr]
What are you waiting for?
[hr]
Webclient:
http://www.runeleak.biz/webclient/webclient.html

[hr]

Forums:
www.runeleak.biz
[hr]
[size=24pt]NOTE: COMBAT EXP = HIGH | SKILLS EXP = LOW[/size]
[hr]

3h3g5wL.png763×501





[hr]
Information about the server:
[hr]
Some more Stability work, didn’t start lagging until 650+ were logged in
Added the Cheat client dupe fix that was released (credits to the person that released)
Clickable buttons in the Quest Tab interface
Implemented Cycle Events (i know its not hard)
Magic works (Ice barrage, Blood barrage, Ect)
Weapon Specs work (Darkbow, Dragon dagger, Godswords and others)
Friendly Staff and members, all training to become better.
Working godwars, 20 kills before entering
Skills like; Farming, Thieving and Agility all work.
Every skill able to be trained to 200m exp.
[hr]
What are you waiting for?
Come and play today, if you join now in the future you’ll be classed as a Veteran member of the community, this will give you cool awards on the forums, so sign up and start making bank today.
[hr]
*

Thanks, hope to see you around in-game.
[/center]

Read full topic
